# body

**Instance Property**

The content and behavior of the chart content.

## Declaration

```swift
@ChartContentBuilder @MainActor @preconcurrency var body: Self.Body { get }
```

## Supporting types

- **VectorizedAreaPlotContent**: An opaque vectorized chart content type.
- **FunctionAreaPlotContent**
